item.title: 修改 Git 提交的作者信息
item.author: chuckxcp@qq.com (Chuck)
item.description: 要修改 Git 提交（commit）的作者信息，直接使用命令可以对最近一次或历史多次的提交进行修改。

item.description: Cloudflare Pages is a JAMstack platform for frontend developers to collaborate and deploy websites.

item.title: Create Git Empty Branch

item.description: Create a new unborn branch, named <new-branch>. All tracked files are removed.
